text: The Lone Ranger is a 2013 action and western movie. The movie is about the Old West in the late 19th century. Johnny Depp plays Tonto. Helena Bonham Carter plays Red. This movie was released on July 3, 2013. The reviews were mixed to negative. The box office, though, was more than $260 million. title: The Lone Ranger (2013 movie)
